text: Jevha he, yusuphakaduna nirasa jhale, tevha ekantata basuna sallamasalata karu lagale. Tyancyapaiki jo sarvanta motha hota to mhanala ki tumhala mahita nahi ki tumacya pityane tumacyakaduna allahala madhyasthi thevuna pakke vacana ghetale ahe ani yacyapurvi tumhi yusuphavisayi aparadha kelela ahe. Ata mi tara bhumituna paya kadhanara nahi, joparyanta pita svatah mala anumati deta nahita kinva sarvasrestha allaha majhya ya samasyeca phaisala karila. Toca sarvottama sasaka ahe
